StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAc.veRecruitersA.erDate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FirstChar varchar(1), @LastChar varchar(1) )
AS
DECLARE @LowerFirstChar varchar(1) = LOWER(@FirstChar) DECLARE @UpperFirstChar varchar(1) = UPPER(@FirstChar) DECLARE @LowerLastChar varchar(1) = LOWER(@LastChar) DECLARE @UpperLastChar varchar(1) = UPPER(@LastChar)
DECLARE @NameFilter varchar(20) = RTRIM('[' + @LowerFirstChar + '-' + @LowerLastChar + @UpperFirstChar + '-' + @UpperLastChar + ']%')
SELECT RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, RP.RANK_CODE, RP.rowguid, P.PERSON_ID, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, CASE WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) END AS [DisplayName], RP.[RowGuid], RP.ORGANIZATION_ID, RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RP.PAY_GRADE_CODE, P.[DOD_ID], M.BILLET_MOS, RP.TOUR_END_DATE, RO.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] AS ORGANIZATION_TYPE, RO.[NAME] AS ORGANIZATION_NAME, OM.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID, Parent.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE, Parent.[NAME] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_NAME, CASE WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RS' THEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] + '_' + RO.[NAME] WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RSS' THEN Parent.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] + '_' + Parent.[NAME] ELSE RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] + '_' + RO.[NAME] END AS RS_NAME, CASE WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RS' THEN RO.[NAME] WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RSS' THEN Parent.[NAME] ELSE RO.[NAME] END AS FILTER_NAME FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] RP INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] P ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[MARINE] M ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = M.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO ON RO.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = RP.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] Parent ON Parent.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] WHERE M.BILLET_MOS IN ('8411', '8412', '8421') AND (RP.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL OR RP.TOUR_END_DATE >= '2015-10-01') AND RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] IN ('RS', 'RSS') AND CASE WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RS' THEN RO.[NAME] WHEN RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RSS' THEN Parent.[NAME] ELSE RO.[NAME] END LIKE @NameFilter ORDER BY RS_NAME, [DisplayName]
